short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and use your AI prompts across various AI tools and websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
📝 Organize Your Prompts
Easily save, categorize, and search your favorite prompts for quick access whenever you need them.

⚡ One-Click Application
Apply stored prompts directly in your favorite AI chats with a single click—no more copy-pasting or searching for past prompts.

🌟 Customizable Prompt Library
Create and edit prompts to suit your unique needs. Use templated variables to easily adapt and reuse your prompts

🔍 Seamless Integration
Works effortlessly with popular LLM-based tools and web chat interfaces, enhancing your browser experience.

📈 Boost Creativity & Efficiency
Turn your AI into a powerful assistant for brainstorming, content creation, or problem-solving.

Take control of your AI interactions and supercharge your productivity with My Prompts. Download now to transform how you work with AI!
